80cbe6559756b8811d5542e5 Description: SureFire SFMB muzzle brake suppressor adapters greatly reduce both recoil impulse and muzzle rise so that your weapon tracks straight back, keeping you on target for faster shot-to-shot recovery. 7fe5839a2d1e2eb9c6045f11 Description: If a traditional birdcage flash hider is what you want, SureFire’s WARCOMP-556-CTN significantly reduces muzzle flash with every shot fired and helps reduce muzzle rise for easier target tracking and faster follow-up shots. Its closed tines reduce the chance you'll snag your barrel in environments where there is dense vegetation or other items that might catch an open-tine flash hider.
9a4179548257f7a1f63f30b1 Description: The advanced SureFire 3P Eliminator three-prong flash hider features a patent-pending design that greatly reduces muzzle flash — typically greater than 99% — when compared with a plain muzzle.

e14eccdfdd902727fe268ed1 Description: SureFire SFMB muzzle brake suppressor adapters greatly reduce both recoil impulse and muzzle rise so that your weapon tracks straight back, keeping you on target for faster shot-to-shot recovery. Precision machined from U.S. mill-certified heat-treated stainless steel bar stock and DLC-coated for extreme durability, they are available for a variety of weapon calibers and muzzle thread specs, and every SFMB serves as a rock-solid mounting adapter for SureFire’s combat-proven SOCOM Series Fast-Attach® suppressors. The SFMB design incorporates multiple bearing surfaces to ensure superior suppressor alignment. Blind pilot holes at the 3 o’ clock and 9 o’clock positions enable fine-tuning of recoil characteristics for individual shooting styles or ammunition characteristics.
bf822c61ce39580e026b6801 Description: The Flash Hider-QD 556 is designed to mitigate flash when unsuppressed. It is compatible with HX-QD series (556k, 556, 762, 762 Ti and Magnum Ti) and FLOW series (556k and 762 Ti) suppressors.

d11567e6b00e6b18db43b036 Description: The FATman Hex Brake was created to solve issues faced by many competition shooters and precision rifle builders. 4b81488c78c8a8ac7d37f9b9 Description: A Colt M4A1 modified by Mechanic to better fire AAC's .300 blackout round. This round is known for being a subsonic performer, effectively the United States' version of Russia's VSS when suppressed. The unsuppressed weapon is still a hard hitting supersonic 30 caliber performer, capable of reaching out in excess of 300 meters.

This variant features a fully automatic firing mode, for Law Enforcement and Millitary use only.

5eb8a73e2c5eae1c5118afcb Description: The D-EVO's unique design lets you move between your 1x red dot site and the 6x magnification D-EVO® by simply shifting your eye line–not your head. Now you can quickly move between close-quarter shots and mid-range shots with speed and accuracy.
a87b4ff0e4df1af49c4d48b7 Description: The D-EVO's unique design lets you move between your 1x red dot site and the 6x magnification D-EVO® by simply shifting your eye line–not your head. Now you can quickly move between close-quarter shots and mid-range shots with speed and accuracy.
bf8cf7b9d0f73ce039591c65 Description: The TA648MGO-M240 6x48 ACOG is a Machine Gun Optic (MGO) designed specifically for the M240 weapon system. The MGO provides the shooter enhanced target identification and increased hit probability out to 1200 meters utilizing the Bullet Drop Compensator.
09f8fed0abd75fbd0f81cd91 Description: The TA648MGO-M2 6x48 ACOG is a Machine Gun Optic (MGO) designed specifically for the .50 BMG M2 weapon system. The MGO provides the shooter enhanced target identification and increased hit probability out to 2000 meters utilizing the Bullet Drop Compensator.
c3ad313c8108f49a65187daf Description: The military’s need for a magnified, self-luminous tactical sight that enhances target identification and increases hit probability on extended-range shots has given rise to the new Trijicon ACOG® 6x48. Powered by Trijicon’s patented fiber optics and tritium-based technology, the new TA648-50 ACOG® reticle features a red chevron aiming point. It also incorporates a bullet drop compensator (BDC) with additional aiming points estimated for trajectory of the .50BMG round out to 1800 meters.
aad949705aece28fb98b820f Description: The military’s need for a magnified, self-luminous tactical sight that enhances target identification and increases hit probability on extended-range shots has given rise to the new Trijicon ACOG® 6x48. 08eb2cce6b620c5c8550a0b5 Description: The military’s need for a magnified, self-luminous tactical sight that enhances target identification and increases hit probability on extended-range shots has given rise to the new Trijicon ACOG® 6x48. 797e1ab4422217d7cfe3d299 Description: The ELCAN SpecterDR 1.5x/6x Legacy is the second evolution in the family of Dual Role Optical Sights. 9936df6f6d9d13591df75e06 Description: Speed reigns supreme in three-gun competition. So if you want  to compete, you better be fast on the target and fast to shoot. Race inspired and tactical strong, the new RT-6™ is built for speed, accuracy and easy handling.
c5042b1c75088ddfc6c196f4 Description: The Golden Eagle HD offers a unique set of features specifically designed for F Class and Bench Rest competition shooters. The 15-60x magnification range, ultra-precise 1/8 MOA adjustments and extremely fine, second focal plane reticle options help maximize precision on known-distance long-range targets.
4af1cb09ea310f1fcf94d32a Description: The Nightforce 3.5-15x50mm riflescope was designed and built to perform in combat. This versatile riflescope provides users with much-needed features and is at home on sniper and special purpose rifles alike.
12f2d58f76f9629580851b6f Name: Vortex Spitfire HD Gen II 5x Prism Scope
12f2d58f76f9629580851b6f Description: For shooters who need more reach without sacrificing speed, the Spitfire™ HD Gen II is built to excel at mid-range engagements. Its fixed magnification delivers sharp, accurate shots with its etched-glass reticle that stays visible even without illumination.
21592d3fa4a2a0fa07fc5c2e Description: Knight's Armament Company QDC CQB 7.62 sound suppressor, which can be installed on compatible QDC Flash Suppressor Kit and QDC Muzzle Brake Kit muzzle devices.
21cc9c10a1749109db74b288 Description: The SureFire SOCOM762-MINI2 delivers big performance levels in a small package optimized for 7.62 mm rifles equipped with 16-inch and longer barrels. It’s compact, measuring just 6.3 inches in length, but it places a premium on efficiency while maintaining the quality synonymous with the SureFire suppressor that dominated the demanding USSOCOM suppressor trials.
ee43d2dd34047cbe88ccf551 Description: The SureFire SOCOM762-MINI2 delivers big performance levels in a small package optimized for 7.62 mm rifles equipped with 16-inch and longer barrels. It’s compact, measuring just 6.3 inches in length, but it places a premium on efficiency while maintaining the quality synonymous with the SureFire suppressor that dominated the demanding USSOCOM suppressor trials.
ba84e1c4ee4d504cb0bdbb0d Description: The SOCOM338-Ti for .338 Lapua sniper rifles is a combat-ready suppressor hewn from high-grade titanium, one of the world’s lightest and most durable materials. Designed and built with extreme tolerances to ensure accuracy, it meets the demands of the most qualified precision sniper rifle shooters in the world. No one has tighter bore runout tolerances than we do, proving that this is the choice for the precision marksman. The SOCOM338 provides unsurpassed signature reduction, nominal and consistent shift in a weapon’s point of impact, and significantly reduced back pressure for consistent results. Expertly engineered, it gets you to where you want to go, no matter how far away it is.
40c62378fa93a829532ecc5e Description: The M4-2000's extreme durability is maximized by CNC automated fusion welding of every high-temperature aerospace alloy component used in its construction- making 100% suppressed full-auto fire possible on barrels as short as 10 inches. The back-pressure lowering design of the silencer aids in shooter comfort, reduces weapon fouling, and minimizes cyclic rate increase. As a final step, tapered-bore EDM technology is utilized to ensure precise bore alignment resulting in enhanced accuracy and maximum performance. By eliminating approximately 97% of the muzzle report, the M4-2000 preserves the hearing of the shooter and nearby support personnel, Eliminating muzzle flash in the harshest of environments.
6d9f22a75064ebb92b3ece1c Description: The M4-2000's extreme durability is maximized by CNC automated fusion welding of every high-temperature aerospace alloy component used in its construction- making 100% suppressed full-auto fire possible on barrels as short as 10 inches. The back-pressure lowering design of the silencer aids in shooter comfort, reduces weapon fouling, and minimizes cyclic rate increase. As a final step, tapered-bore EDM technology is utilized to ensure precise bore alignment resulting in enhanced accuracy and maximum performance. By eliminating approximately 97% of the muzzle report, the M4-2000 preserves the hearing of the shooter and nearby support personnel, Eliminating muzzle flash in the harshest of environments.
10a09a7adb949d7516c96c2f Name: B&T RBS 762 Compact SF sound suppressor
10a09a7adb949d7516c96c2f Description: The B&T RBS Compact SF is part of their Reduced Back pressure System (RBS) family of SMG and rifle silencers.  The flow-through technology features a low-pressure chamber design to absorb a large volume of gas without directing it back into the firearm.  This drastically reduces or even eliminates, excess gas pressure.  To the shooter, this results in a quieter silencer at the ear, less blowback, and a smoother cycling firearm.
ea0407e322d619bdb163795c Description: The SureFire SOCOM556-RC3 suppressor combines decades of SureFire innovation in materials and manufacturing techniques with the most extensive flow dynamics study in history. The result of exclusive parametric modeling and multi-variable aerospace software research on advanced supercomputers, the RC3 is a gamechanger in modern suppressor technology.
9f56d67e30b6ee14fbd99821 Description: The SureFire SOCOM556-RC3 suppressor combines decades of SureFire innovation in materials and manufacturing techniques with the most extensive flow dynamics study in history.
